sourcesContent:
import { Component } from "@angular/core"; import { NgForm } from "@angular/forms"; @Component({ selector: "app-auth", templateUrl: "./auth.component.html", }) export class AuthComponent { isLoginMode = true; onSwitchMode() { this.isLoginMode = !this.isLoginMode; } onSubmit(form: NgForm) { console.log(form.value); form.reset; } }
|
